item.description:
Let's try this one again! :)

We got rained out last year, so we will be trying it again in May!

We will be meeting at America's Stonehenge at noon time-
And will share a picnic lunch (everyone to bring their own)

Then we will watch a short movie, about the site, in the main building, browse the store,
and do our own walking tour of the standing stones, and stone village.....

When we finish exploring this ancient site, those who want to, will go to Gardenia's, which is a new age store, that is 5 minutes away....there people can shop, or get a tarot, or tea leaf reading.....

And after that, Susan has graciously offered up her house for a meeting afterwards, for anyone who wants to gather, as she too, lives right down the road....

People are free to come to any, or all of the activities planned this day :)

Below is information on what America Stonehenge is, and the website to check it out,
and also the website for Gardenia's, their prices, and what they offer. :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

What is America's Stonehenge?

Built by a Native American Culture or a migrant European population? No one knows for sure. A maze of man-made chambers, walls and ceremonial meeting places, America's Stonehenge is most likely the oldest man-made construction in the United States (over 4000 years old). Like Stonehenge in England, America's Stonehenge was built by ancient people well versed in astronomy and stone construction. It has been determined that the site is an accurate astronomical calendar. It was, and still can be, used to determine specific solar and lunar events of the year.
Various inscriptions have been found throughout the site including Ogham, Phoenician and Iberian Punic Script. Dr. Barry Fell of Harvard University did extensive work on the inscriptions found at the site.
They are detailed in his book America B.C.

The website for America's Stonehenge is:

http://www.stonehenge...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


The website for Gardenia's is:
 
 http://mygardenias.co...

See you there!!!! :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the main building
item.name: Trip To America's Stonehenge
